title: Quintessential Beachfront Maui Escape with Daily Breakfast & Hawaiian Luau Experience
description:
Experience the magic of Maui from this tropical oasis, set on an exclusive stretch of pristine Ka'anapali Beach. This stylish beachfront resort offers a collection of exquisite rooms and bungalows, each boasting private balconies or lanais to soak up views of the lush gardens or sparkling ocean. Enjoy oceanfront dining at Royal Ocean Terrace, sip cocktails at The Beach Bar or savour handmade ice cream at Royal Scoop. 

Realign your chakras with a restorative treatment at Alana Spa or capitalise on the resort's impressive selection of beach activities - from paddleboarding and kayaking to whale watching and sunset cruises. No stay is complete without experiencing The Myths of Maui Luau, a cultural show featuring historic tales, delicious food, song and dance.

title: Adults-Only Escape at Hawaii's #1 Hotel
description: Experience the ultimate romantic escape at Hotel Wailea, a five-star, adults-only property rated the #1 hotel in Hawaii by Condé Nast Traveler and the #1 hotel in Maui by Travel+Leisure. Situated just a short 23-minute flight from Honolulu, you can enjoy three nights of tropical boutique luxury at Hawaii's only prestigious Relais & Châteaux property nestled in an ultra-private enclave where you'll find 180-degree ocean views of three of Hawaii's islands. Includes a welcome fruit plate, yoga classes, a US$200 food and beverage credit to use towards creative island-to-table cuisine and more.
offer_address: 555 Kaukahi Street, Wailea, HI 96753, United States of America

title: Serene Beachfront Maui Escape with Daily Breakfast & Hawaiian Luau Experience
description:
Experience the quintessential magic of Maui from this tropical haven, set on an exclusive stretch of pristine Ka’anapali Beach. This stylish beachfront resort offers a collection of exquisite rooms and bungalows, each boasting private balconies or lanais to soak up views of the lush gardens or sparkling ocean. Enjoy oceanfront dining at Lahaina Noon, sip cocktails at Pineapple Moon or savour handmade ice cream at Royal Scoop.

Reset and revive with a restorative treatment at the Alana Spa or partake in the resort’s impressive selection of beach activities, from paddleboarding and kayaking to whale watching and sunset cruising. No stay is complete without experiencing The Myths of Maui Luau, a cultural show featuring historic tales, delicious food, song and dance.

title: Romantic Maui Relais & Châteaux Escape with Gourmet Dining Inclusions
description: Make the ultimate romantic escape at Hotel Wailea, a lavish adults-only property named by Condé Nast Traveler as one of 2019's 'Top 21 Most Romantic Hotels in the World', and rated as Hawaii's #2 resort by the 2019 Condé Nast Traveler Reader’s Choice Awards. Experience boutique luxury at the only Hawaiian property by the elite Relais & Châteaux brand, nestled in an ultra-private enclave and boasting stunning 180-degree views over three of Hawaii's islands. Enjoy outstanding service and be pampered by daily breakfast, a bottle of Laurent Perrier Champagne on arrival, complimentary fitness classes, a US$100 food and drink credit to use at any of the resort's dining venues, a tropical mixology class and complimentary transfers within the Wailea area.
offer_address: 555 Kaukahi Street, Wailea, HI 96753, United States of America

title: Beachfront Maui Beauty on Kaanapali Coast with Pools, Waterfall & Waterslide
description:
Experience the charm of Maui's Kaanapali North Beach with a tropical, self-contained stay at this oceanfront oasis. Enjoy the stunning aquatic playground with multiple pools and a rejuvenating spa. Delight in fresh, farm-to-table cuisine at Duke's Beach House or indulge in gourmet grab-and-go options at 'Aina Gourmet Market.

Enjoy a dip in five hot tubs and let your kids play in the kids' area with fountains and a waterslide. A short drive away, you'll find the historic town of Lahaina, teeming with unique shops, restaurants and the famous Banyan Tree Park. For the adventurous, embark on a whale-watching tour (seasonal) or explore the majestic Haleakala National Park.
offer_address: 130 Kai Malina Parkway, Lahaina, Hawaii 96761, USA

title: Maui Tropical Beachfront Paradise with Onsite Dining, Three Pools & Luxe Spa
description:
Soak up the sun-drenched allure of Maui's southern coastline with a stay at this five-star Fairmont sanctuary, overlooking the shimmering waters of the Pacific Ocean. Set on 22 acres of pristine beachfront and lush tropical gardens, this Hawaiian sanctuary invites you to unwind in spacious suites and villas, each private lanais showcasing the island’s laid-back elegance.

Relish in award-winning dining at Kō Restaurant and sip handcrafted cocktails at Pilina - Fairmont Kea Lani’s Premier Lounge. For seafood lovers, Nick’s Fishmarket Maui promises a feast of ocean-fresh delicacies. Indulge in three shimmering pools, embrace the spirit of Hawaii through cultural experiences, or walk on the soft white sands of Polo Beach.
offer_address: 4100 Wailea Alanui Drive, Wailea-Makena, Hawaii 96753, USA

title: Maui Authentic Hawaiian Beachfront Resort by Outrigger with Cultural Activities
description: Embrace the true essence of Hawaii on the picturesque Maui beachfront at Outrigger Ka'anapali Beach Resort. This authentically Hawaiian resort offers the ultimate island experience, including a program of cultural activities, from lei-making to hula dancing. Explore the vibrant Whalers Village and embark on a historic journey along the Lahaina Historic Trail. After a day of adventures, retreat to the resort's beachfront cabanas or indulge at Maui Brewing Company and Pau Hana Pool Shack.
offer_address: 2525 Kaanapali Parkway, Kaanapali Beach, Lahaina, Maui, Hawaii 96761, United States

vendor_name: Kaanapali Maui at the Eldorado by OUTRIGGER
title: Self-Contained Maui Condo Escape with Three Pools & Private Beach Cabana
description:
Relax in the privacy of a spacious vacation condo in this family-friendly Hawaiian retreat overlooking the azure Pacific Ocean. Savour the island's natural beauty from your private lanai, stroll along the golden sands of Kaanapali Beach, or explore the nearby Whalers Village, a vibrant hub of shopping and dining.

Delight in fresh seafood at the nearby Duke's Beach House, sip tropical drinks at Maui Brewing Co., or take a scenic drive to the historic town of Lahaina. Onsite, enjoy a refreshing dip in one of the three swimming pools or challenge yourself on the putting greens at the nearby Kaanapali Golf Course.
location_description: Kaanapali Maui at the Eldorado by OUTRIGGER
offer_address: 2661 Kekaa Drive, Lahaina, Kaanapali, Hawaii 96761, USA

title: Romantic Five-Star Hawaii Relais & Châteaux Suites with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Champagne
description:
Hidden within one of Maui’s most exclusive enclaves, nestled amid 15 acres of lush, tropical hillside, awaits Hotel Wailea - the only Hawaiian property by the elite Relais & Châteaux brand. Perched 300 feet above the sea with unobstructed views of three Hawaiian islands, this five-star adults-only oasis invites you to find seclusion at one of Hawaii’s top hotels, winner at Condé Nast Traveler’s 2020 Readers’ Choice Awards and rated among the top 1% in the world on Tripadvisor.

Start each day at this romantic retreat with morning yoga beside a glistening waterfall, then while away an afternoon on a tranquil poolside cabana, before savouring the fruits of Hotel Wailea’s own kitchen garden and orchard at the restaurant. By day, enjoy convenient access to island adventures - from valet beach service to and from Wailea Beach, where chairs, umbrellas and refreshments are supplied, to boutique shopping and Maui exploration - and luxurious tranquility by night in one of just 72 expansive suites.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions**:

- Drink in ocean views as you’re treated to **daily breakfast** at The Restaurant at Hotel Wailea
- Toast to your romantic rendezvous with a **bottle of champagne** on arrival

**Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Best of the Best 2020** Top 25 Hotels for Romance - United States
offer_address: 555 Kaukahi Street, Wailea, HI 96753, United States of America
